transcript:
Customer: Duniya mein mujhe jo bhi mila jitna mila hai duniya mein mujhe jo bhi mila

(silence)

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Haan ji madam.

Executive: Sir main Heba baat kar rahi hu.

Executive: Sir aap mera call hi receive nahi kar rahe hain sir.

Customer: Woh madam busy tha main isliye call receive nahi kiya aapka.

Executive: Achcha like mujhe aapka concern receive hua tha sir abhi leads ka issue aa raha tha.

Customer: Woh lead toh wohi aa rahi hai mere paas mein jo dining table iske alawa kuch aati nahi hai aur mere paas mein. Haan sir aap mujhe bata mujhe batate na main aapko kitne din se call kar rahi hu aap call hi receive nahi kar rahe ho.

Customer: Madam kitni baar bata diya maine aapko pehle se hi bata rakha hai aapko toh.

Executive: Toh sir dekhe aapne hamare customer care ko kiya aaya toh mere paas hi na concern woh nahi karenge kuch karungi toh main hi na.

Customer: Toh kya karu phir mera dimag kharab ho jata hai woh main phir woh feedback de deta hu. Feedback likh deta hu main.

Executive: Achcha sir uske liye aata mere paas hi aapne kal se kiya kal se main aapko try kar rahi hu aap mera call bhi toh nahi utha rahe hain sir main aapko.

Customer: Madam madam main free nahi hota main busy rehta hu madam karkhane mein aur karkhane mein main jab aapka phone uthaunga toh aawaz hi nahi aayegi. Isliye main call nahi uthata tha abhi dekho machine ki aawaz aa rahi hai na aapko.

Executive: Haan woh toh sir mujhe pata hai ki aap busy rehte ho.

Customer: Haan yeh dekho yeh dekho machine ki aawaz.

Customer: Phone nahi uthata tha aapka nahi madam main main main jo partiya main jiska kaam kar raha hu na unka bhi phone nahi uthata main.

Executive: Achcha. Nahi sir kyuki main isliye aapko beech mein se call kar leti hu ki aapko koi issue toh nahi aa raha agar aa raha hota toh aap mujhe bata dete matlab ki haan leads ka kuch aa raha hai.

Customer: Madam issue toh yahi hai ki mere paas mein jo lead hai woh dining table ke alawa kuch aur bahut hi kam aa rahi hai. Aur main yeh kehta hu ki mere paas mein jo marble pillar hai home temple hai marble masjid mehraab hai.

Executive: Haan main samajh rahi hu aapke paas dining table ki zyada aa rahi hai lekin baki ki kam aa rahi hai matlab aa rahi hai lekin kam aa rahi hai.

Customer: Bilkul kam aa rahi hai bilkul yeh samjho aap 5% 10% aa rahi hai baki ki baki 91% yahi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Jo baki jo jinme aapko chahiye jis jo aapko kam aa rahi hai us jitni aa rahi hai na aap un sabko consume karo.

Customer: Bilkul bilkul main yahi kar raha hu madam yahi kar raha hu main.

Executive: Haan toh aap jab woh karoge na toh uska aapka ek pattern set hoga kyuki abhi na aapne mostly leads dining table ki utha rahi hai toh hamare system ko ek command mila hua hai ki aapko dining table ki lead chahiye is wajah se aapko.

Customer: Toh madam aap hata nahi sakte kya waha pe computer se.

Executive: Sir aap computer AI ke through hota hai ab main AI thodi na hu sir woh toh computer khud hi command leta hai na tabhi maine aapko bola tha ki aap search karke unko consume karo.

Customer: Madam maine dining table ke lead uthaye hota hai hota hai mujhe time ho gaya ab phir bhi mere paas mein dining table hi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Uthayenge na lekin mostly toh aapne usi mein.

Customer: Toh mujhe mujhe kuch mujhe kuch option hi nahi tha madam isliye main phir dining table ke lead utha uthata tha.

Executive: Woh cheez main aapke sath samajh rahi hu achche se tabhi main aapko bol rahi hu ki jitni aapko baki product ki jaise pillar wagera hai temple hai inki jo aa rahi hai na woh aap zyada uthao jitni bhi aa rahi hai na.

Customer: Ji bilkul bilkul mere samne jaise hi aati hai lead main uthata hu hand to hand uthata hu madam.

Executive: Aap unko uthao jitni aap yeh karoge na jitni aap un leads ko uthaoge jitni zyada aapko phir unki bhi lead aayegi aur main yeh cheez matlab isiliye bol rahi hu aapko maine pehle bhi aapko yeh cheez boli thi ki aap search karke bhi karo aap dekho.

Customer: Ji madam main ek din mein char ya panch baar search karta hu main.

Executive: Hmm haan toh uss time pe aapko jitni bhi dikhe na uss time pe aap dekho uss din mere ko dikhi thi aapke liye leads jaise temple wagera ki aur woh toh maine aapko whatsapp pe bhi share kar di thi right sir abhi main yeh kar rahi hu ki main ek na aapke liye group bana deti hu. IndiaMART ka chat help group agar kuch bhi concern ho usme main apni jo meri higher hierarchy hai na matlab mere manager aur ek violet team woh sabko main add kar de rahi hu usme.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Thik hai group mein main bhi houngi mere manager wagera bhi hoyenge agar aapko haan.

Customer: Ji main yeh bol raha hu madam.

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Jo aap se ho sakta hai woh mere liye aap kar dijiye.

Executive: Haan wohi kyuki main keh rahi hu madam haan main aapko aage main ek group bana de rahi hu agar main bhi lead agar mere ko bhi koi lead dikha karegi na toh main bhi aapko share kar diya karungi jaise main aapko kar deti hu agar mujhe dikhti hai toh main uss group mein hi kar diya karungi agar aapko kuch concern hota bhi hai ki lead nahi aa rahi hai ya kaunsi zyada aa rahi hai kaunsi kam aa rahi hai toh aap usi group mein likh diya karna kyuki dekho aap customer care ko kar dete ho phir woh concern raise ho jata hai woh mere liye and then matlab laut phir ke aata mere paas hi hai kyuki connect main hi aapse karungi.

Customer: Ji ji aap hi manager ho mere hisab se aapke paas mein aaya woh toh.

Executive: Yes isiliye maine aapko itni baar bola hai ki sir agar kuch bhi hai toh aap mujhe bola karo mujhe message karo.

Customer: Lekin madam main solution nahi ho raha na isliye main woh feedback de deta hu phir.

Executive: Sir sir solution toh main hi aapko dungi na sir solution toh main hi dungi.

Customer: Nahi aap toh de rahe ho mujhe yeh toh baat sahi hai lekin ho nahi raha na solution.

Executive: Toh sir woh maine wohi toh aapko bola ki usse hi hoga jitni aap leads consume karoge kyuki sir dekho AI ko toh main bhi nahi chala sakti na hi company chala sakti sir AI ko toh AI toh apne usse hi chalega na kyuki uska toh yahi hai usko jo command milegi wohi.

Customer: Aapke computer se agar kuch ho sakta hai toh mere liye kuch kar dijiye aap.

Executive: Main itna kar sakti hu sir ki agar koi lead aa jati hai toh main bhi apne aap main apni side se aapko uss group mein share kar dungi aur kuch time ke liye aap bhi search karke jo bhi leads aapko chahe kam kyu na aa rahi ho chahe do aa rahi ho chahe teen aa rahi ho kisi aur product ki dining table ke alawa toh aap un do ya teen leads ko consume karo bas aap itna karo ki aap alag product ki leads ko zyada se zyada consume karne ka try karo jitni aap consume karoge na ek pattern set ho jayega phir aage se aapko woh leads bhi aane lagenge.

Customer: Ji madam abhi main main main yahi kar raha hu main.

Executive: Haan toh ab yahi aap karo agar mere ko bhi koi aur lead dikhti hai dining table ke alawa toh main aapko group mein bhi share kar dungi agar mujhe koi dikh jati hai toh aur nahi toh aap apni side se dining table ke alawa dusri leads ko consume karna start kar do kyuki aapne dining table ki zyada chuni hai na is wajah se zyada aapko dining table ki usiliye dikhti hai sir.

Customer: Ji ji madam ji.

Executive: Thik hai.

Customer: Ji madam thik hai thik hai.

Executive: Haan abhi ke liye main aapka concern jo aapne raise kiya tha woh main close kar rahi hu sir.

Customer: Ji madam woh aur yeh yeh toh bata do aap woh kaunsa group bana rahe ho naam kya hai uss group ka.

Executive: Aapko main abhi abhi IndiaMART chat help ke naam se hoga Mahira Marble IndiaMART chat help toh abhi bana ke main aapko whatsapp pe add kar leti hu usme group mein.

Customer: Ji ji ji thik hai madam.

Executive: Thik hai haan aur phir aapke paas abhi woh aayega ek feedback mere liye toh uss pe satisfied hi mark karna aap.

Customer: Ji ji bilkul bilkul.

Executive: Thik hai haan thik hai chale.

Executive: Thik hai madam thank you.

Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai.

(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving only dining table leads.

- Customer is not receiving leads for other products.



Resolution:

- Executive created a WhatsApp group for support.

- Executive will share leads in the group.

- Customer needs to consume other product leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add customer to WhatsApp group.

- Customer will receive a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, whatsapp group, resolution
